013package org.apache.juneau.internal;
014
015import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantReadWriteLock;
016
017/**
018 * An extension of {@link ReentrantReadWriteLock} with convenience methods for creating
019 * auto-closeable locks.
020 */
021public class SimpleNoOpLock extends ReentrantReadWriteLock {
022   private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
023
024   /**
025    * Constructor.
026    */
027   public SimpleNoOpLock() {
028      super();
029   }
030
031   /**
032    * Constructor
033    *
034    * @param fair <jk>true</jk> if this lock should use a fair ordering policy.
035    */
036   public SimpleNoOpLock(boolean fair) {
037      super(fair);
038   }
039
040   /**
041    * Construct a write lock.
042    *
043    * @return A new closeable write lock.
044    */
045   public SimpleLock write(){
046      return new SimpleLock(writeLock());
047   }
048
049   /**
050    * Construct a read lock.
051    *
052    * @return A new closeable read lock.
053    */
054   public SimpleLock read(){
055      return new SimpleLock(readLock());
056   }
057}
